snippet.title: Sword Art Online: Hollow Fragment - Ps Vita - Survive to SAO (E3 2014 Trailer)
snippet.description:
Will you survive to Swor dArt Online? You should becasue dying in the MMORPG will kill you in real life...

Sword Art Online: Hollow Fragment captures the characters and storyline of the SAO universe -- a series of virtual-reality worlds set in the near future. Combo attacks, execution speed and knowledge of the opponent will be mandatory to survive in this VR world! 

On top of the Hollow Fragment episode, this new SAO game will feature Sword Art Online: Infinity Moment - originally released in Japan for the PlayStation®Portable. Infinity Moment will benefit from all the PlayStation®Vita power as he it will get enhanced HD graphics!

Sword Art Online: Hollow Fragment will be available on PS Vita (Digital Only) this Summer 2014.
For more information, please visit the official website http://swordartonline-game.com or your local Namco Bandai Games website, http://www.bandainamcogames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.bandainamcogames.eu/community
